title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
It's one of Colin's favorite days of the year where he reacts to the first round of the NFL draft and the Packers not taking a wide receiver after losing Davante Adams in the off season. He believes the only quarterback drafted, Kenny Pickett, landing with the Steelers is the perfect fit. He also has doubts about the 2 teams everyone believes "won the draft" last night. Plus, Fox Sports college football analyst Joel Klatt joins the show to tell Colin which teams did well in the draft and which teams selected a bust.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
